text: I Spit on Your Grave is a 1978 American rape and revenge horror thriller movie. It was widely released in 1980. This movie was very controversial. Most critics did not like it. Roger Ebert gave the movie thumbs down. It became a cult classic in later years. It was remade in 2010. == Other websites == * Category:1978 crime thriller movies Category:1978 horror movies Category:1970s horror thriller movies Category:1970s serial killer movies Category:American crime thriller movies Category:American horror thriller movies Category:American serial killer movies Category:English-language movies Category:Rape in movies Category:American independent movies
title: I Spit on Your Grave
